name: Abyssum
description:
Abyssum is a 2D horizontal shoot them up, playable locally by 4 players. 
Players can earn points by either hitting or killing ennemies, but lose some if they die. 
Pick-ups spread throughout the level can be used to push other players into projectiles and ennemies. 
The goal of the game is to get the highest score possible by the end of the level.

Website :

http://www.abyssum.ovh/

Controls :

Only playable using controllers

  • Move around using the left joystick
  • Attack enemies using the A button
  • Push other players using the X button when available
